com.nestlabs.sdk

Class GlobalUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nestlabs.sdk.GlobalUpdate

  • public class GlobalUpdate
extends Object
    GlobalUpdate contains the state of all devices, structures and metadata in the Nest account when a change is detected in anything. A GlobalUpdate object is returned by NestListener.GlobalListener.onUpdate(GlobalUpdate) when an update occurs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ArrayList<Camera> getCameras()
      Returns all the Camera objects in the Nest account at the time of the update.
      Metadata getMetadata()
      Returns the Metadata object in the Nest account at the time of the update.

      Returns all the SmokeCOAlarm objects in the Nest account at the time of the update.
      ArrayList<Structure> getStructures()
      Returns all the Structure objects in the Nest account at the time of the update.
      ArrayList<Thermostat> getThermostats()
      Returns all the Thermostat objects in the Nest account at the time of the update.
